title: Dave Richard reveals five fantasy values, where to draft Julio/Gordon (Football 07/26)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports fantasy guru Dave Richard to break down the latest news around the NFL, including Josh Gordon's situation (and where to draft him), the Browns interest in Dez Bryant and what it means for the fantasy value of those guys, Andrew Luck's status with Colts training camp, Bill Belichick's opening press conference and Sony Michel's value. Then the guys give out five players they think are undervalued heading into fantasy football drafts before coming up with an Earl Thomas-Julio Jones trade that might actually make sense.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
